body_html:
@killeent I get:

iter 0
/home/ankit/devel/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorRandom.cuh:135: void sampleMultinomialOnce(long *, long, int, T *, T *) [with T = float, AccT = float]: block: [2,0,0], thread: [0,0,0] Assertion `!isinf(sum)` failed.
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/home/ankit/devel/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generated/../THCTensorMathCompare.cuh line=84 error=59 : device-side assert triggered
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test.py", line 11, in <module>
    if ((sampled > 5).sum()):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/tensor.py", line 398, in __gt__
    return self.gt(other)
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (59) : device-side assert triggered at /home/ankit/devel/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generated/../THCTensorMathCompare.cuh:84

on running the first test code from the bug report.

body:
@killeent I get:
```
iter 0
/home/ankit/devel/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorRandom.cuh:135: void sampleMultinomialOnce(long *, long, int, T *, T *) [with T = float, AccT = float]: block: [2,0,0], thread: [0,0,0] Assertion `!isinf(sum)` failed.
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/home/ankit/devel/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generated/../THCTensorMathCompare.cuh line=84 error=59 : device-side assert triggered
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test.py", line 11, in <module>
    if ((sampled > 5).sum()):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/torch/tensor.py", line 398, in __gt__
    return self.gt(other)
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (59) : device-side assert triggered at /home/ankit/devel/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generated/../THCTensorMathCompare.cuh:84
```
on running the first test code from the bug report.
